text: He nabi! Tomara yakhana tomadera striganake talaka dite icche kara taderake talaka di'o iddatera prati laksa rekhe [1] ebam tomara iddatera hiseba rekho. Ara tomadera raba allahara taka'oya abalambana karo. Tomara taderake tadera gharabari theke bahiskara karo na [2] ebam tara'o bera habe na, yadi na tara lipta haya spasta aslilataya [3].
